result.execSummary:
The defendant Emmanuel L Maddox was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Emmanuel L Maddox is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Emmanuel L Maddox was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Emmanuel L Maddox was found guilty of Contempt of Court/Disobey Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 785.01(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: IMPOSED AND STAYED. 6 days of credit if revoked. Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program. Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.

Each ct concur to each other, 21CM2456, 22CF671, 22CF1197, 22CF1997 and 22CM149. Def may terminate probation after 2.5 years if all conditions are met including all financial obligations and no new referrals.
Concurrent with: each other, 21CM2456, 22CF671, 22CF1197, 22CF1997 and 22CM149

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.
DA has 30 days to prepare/submit order.

Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with KJR except by text messages only and only regarding child visitation/exchange. Def shall not threaten or use abusive or vulgar language towards KJR. Ban from 400 blk of Rethke Ave in Madison, WI or KJR's residence or place of employment.

Completion of certified domestic violence treatment. GPS monitoring as deemed appropriate by agent. Completion of aggression/anger management treatment. DNA on file. Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

2:50 PM Defendant Emmanuel L Maddox in court, in custody.  Attorney Dominic Richards in court for Emmanuel L Maddox.  Prosecuting attorney Hector Al-Homsi in court for the State of Wisconsin. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to counts 1 and 6.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

AMENDMENTS: 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #  2, 3, 5 . 

On Motion of the State, the Court DRI Count # 4  .Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #      6
Court I/S a sentence of: 
-Serve 3 months in the DCJ, with Huber cc to ct 1, 21CM2456, 22CF671, 22CF1197, 22CF1997, 22CM149 

IMPOSED AND STAYED

COUNT #      1
-serve 2 years, 6 months in WSP, bifurcated into:
-initial confinement: 1 year, 6 months
-extended supervision: 1 year

Challenge Incarceration Program: Eligible
Substance Abuse Program: Eligible

-Stayed for 3 years probation cc to ct 6, 21CM2456, 22CF671, 22CF1197, 22CF1997, 22CM149

CONDITIONS:

*****Ct 1-Serve 2 months in the DCJ, w/o huber, cs to 22CF1197******

-No contact with: KJR except by text messages only and only regarding child visitation/exchange. Defn shall not threaten or use abusive or vulgar language towards KJR
-Ban from: 400 blk of Rethke Ave in Madison, WI or KJR's residence or place of employment
-Certified DV treatment
-GPS monitoring as deemed appropriate by agent
-Anger management
-DNA on file
-Defendant may terminate probation after 2.5 years if all conditions are met, including all financial obligations and no new referrals
-Restitution: (State has 30 days to prepare an order)
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct #1, 6
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due on probation

-Bond posted to be applied to restitution, remainder to fines/cc. Return any balance to poster. 
 
-Ct 1 Days credit if revoked: 6 days
-Ct 6 Days credit if revoked: 98 days

DE advised of post-conviction rights

*IN CUSTODY*
Defendant Emmanuel L Maddox in court, in custody.  Attorney Trisha Simmons for Hector Al-Homsi in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Dominic Richards in court for Emmanuel L Maddox. State moves Court to find counts 1, 2, 3 transactionally related. No objection. Ct so finds. Officer JT duly sworn and testified. Direct by ADA Simmons. Venue established. DE identified. Cross. State moves Court to take judicial notice of bond in 22CF1197, granted. State moves for b/o, waives argument, reserves rebuttal. DE objects to b/o, argument. Ct finds PC felony was probably committed by DE and binds case over.

CASH BAIL PREVIOUSLY POSTED OF $500 TO BE APPLIED TO THIS BOND. 
Cash bond is set in the amount of $1,500 (per case). If the defendant posts cash bail, the defendant must report to and comply with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report to Pretrial Services by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.

- Defendant may use third party once a week for child visitation/exchanges.
